<table cellspacing=3D"0" cellpadding=3D"0" width=3D"395" id=3D"u"><tr><td i=
d=3D"s"><table cellspacing=3D"0" cellpadding=3D"0"><tr><td id=3D"i"><span i=
d=3D"p"><table cellpadding=3D"4" cellspacing=3D"4" align=3D"right" id=3D"aw=
"><tr><td align=3D"center"><table align=3D"center" cellpadding=3D"0" cellsp=
acing=3D"0" width=3D"1" id=3D"at"><tr><td><a href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.c=

if" align=3D"center" id=3D"ao" width=3D"180" /></a><tr><td align=3D"right" =
id=3D"ap">&nbsp; <tr><td align=3D"left" id=3D"aq">&nbsp; </table></table> M=
obile marketing automation platform <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchboo=
k.com/n/9638.1234247.345909">Kahuna</a> has raised $11 million in Series A =
funding from <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234248.34=
5909">Sequoia Capital</a>. Sequoia's <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbo=
ok.com/n/9638.1234249.345909">Omar Hamoui</a> has joined the company's Boar=
d. Kahuna previously raised $2 million in seed funding from <a id=3D"b" hre=
f=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234250.345909">SoftTech VC</a>, <a id=
=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234251.345909">Costanoa Ven=
ture Capital</a>, <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.12342=
52.345909">Promus Ventures</a> and others in October 2013.<br><br> The comp=
any has also announced a significant expansion of its platform, introducing=
 new testing and push response tracking tools that provide insights into th=
e effectiveness of mobile marketing campaigns, allowing marketers to delive=
r the right message at the right time to grow app usage and revenue. Kahuna=
 will use the new capital to continue developing its mobile marketing solut=
ion, scale operations and expand its customer base.<br><br> The size of Kah=
una's Series A round isn't very common; only <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my=
.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234253.345909" target=3D"blank">474 U.S.-based Serie=
s A deals of $10 million or more in size</a> have been completed since the =
beginning of 2011, according to the PitchBook Platform. To put that in pers=
pective, such deals accounted for only about 15% of all Series A rounds bet=
ween 2011 and 2013, with the median Series A deal size being $3.4 million. =
The largest Series A financing in the time period was <a id=3D"b" href=3D"h=
ttps://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234254.345909">AirWatch</a>'s $225 million =
round, which reached its total after a $25 million extension in May 2013. T=
he industries landing the largest portions of the $10 million+ Series A dea=
l flow since 2011 include IT (37%), healthcare (35%), B2C (13%) and B2B (9%=
).</span><tr><td id=3D"i"><table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0"><tr><t=
d width=3D"187" valign=3D"top" id=3D"y"><div id=3D"f"><div id=3D"g"><div id=
=3D"ah"><a href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234247.345909" id=3D"an=
">Kahuna</a></div></div></div><div id=3D"f"><span id=3D"h"> Media and Infor=
mation Services </span></div><div id=3D"f"><span id=3D"h"><span>Mobile</spa=
n><br></span></div><div id=3D"f"><span id=3D"h"> Mountain View, CA </span><=

<a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234276.345909'>Riverst=
one Holdings</a>' <a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.12342=
77.345909'>Fieldwood Energy</a> has closed its acquisition of the Gulf of M=
exico and Gulf Coast business of <a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.c=
om/n/9638.1234278.345909'>SandRidge Energy</a> (NYSE: SD) for about $705 mi=
llion. The deal gives Fieldwood the largest asset base on the Gulf of Mexic=
o Shelf. Fieldwood has also expanded its existing debt facilities, includin=
g a revolving credit facility and first and second lien term loans, led by =
<a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234279.345909'>Citigro=

0" width=3D"1" id=3D"at"><tr><td><a href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638=

>&nbsp; <tr><td align=3D"left" id=3D"aq">&nbsp; </table></table><a id=3D"b"=
 href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234311.345909">ZEFR</a>, a provid=
er of social marketing and rights management software for online video, has=
 raised $30 million in a new financing round led by <a id=3D"b" href=3D"htt=
ps://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234312.345909">Institutional Venture Partners=
</a>, with participation from existing investors <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https:=

res</a>, <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234315.345909=
">First Round Capital</a> and <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/=
n/9638.1234316.345909">Richmond Park Partners</a>. The new capital will hel=
p drive the company&rsquo;s software development and grow its sales and mar=
keting teams.<br><br> ZEFR provides SaaS solutions for brands and content o=
wners on <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234317.345909=
">YouTube</a>. Its BrandID platform connects fans and franchises, and helps=
 brands manage and monetize their fans, while its Rights Management platfor=
m manages and monetizes professional rights for major studios and labels. Z=
EFR has now raised over $61 million in funding to date, including a previou=
s $18.8 million Series C round that valued the company at about $93 million=
.</span><tr><td id=3D"i"><table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0"><tr><td=

/a>Educational Gaming Platform If You Can Company Raises $6.5M </div></div>=
<div id=3D"v"><div id=3D"r"><input type=3D"hidden" value=3D"6GO2XNPTUEAQQ"/=
><table cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0"><tr><td><div id=3D"w"> SHARE: <=
/div><td><div id=3D"c"><a id=3D"d" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.=
1234318.345909" target=3D"_blank"><img id=3D"e" src=3D"http://marketo.pitch=
book.com/rs/pitchbook/images/smem.gif"></a></div><td><div id=3D"c"><a id=3D=
"d" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234319.345909" target=3D"_blan=
k"><img id=3D"e" src=3D"http://marketo.pitchbook.com/rs/pitchbook/images/sm=
tw.gif"></a></div><td><div id=3D"c"><a id=3D"d" href=3D"https://my.pitchboo=
k.com/n/9638.1234320.345909" target=3D"_blank"><img id=3D"e" src=3D"http://=
marketo.pitchbook.com/rs/pitchbook/images/smin.gif"></a></div><td><div id=
=3D"c"><a id=3D"d" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234321.345909" =
target=3D"_blank"><img id=3D"e" src=3D"http://marketo.pitchbook.com/rs/pitc=
hbook/images/smfb.png"></a></div></table></div></div><table cellspacing=3D"=
0" cellpadding=3D"0" width=3D"395" id=3D"u"><tr><td id=3D"s"><table cellspa=
cing=3D'0' cellpadding=3D'0'><tr><td id=3D"i"><span id=3D"p"><a id=3D"b" hr=
ef=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234322.345909'>If You Can Company</a=
>, a gaming platform that teaches children social and emotional learning (S=
EL) skills, has closed a $6.5 million Series A round of funding led by <a i=
d=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234323.345909'>Greylock Pa=
rtners</a>, with participation from <a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchboo=
k.com/n/9638.1234324.345909'>Almaz Capital</a>, <a id=3D"b" href=3D'https:/=
/my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234325.345909'>DBL Investors</a> and others. The =
startup was founded by <a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.=
1234326.345909'>Trip Hawkins</a>, a gaming industry veteran that previously=
 founded <a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234327.345909=
'>Electronic Arts</a> and <a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/96=
38.1234328.345909'>Digital Chocolate</a>. Previously, If You Can raised $2.=
8 million from founders, angels and seed funds including <a id=3D"b" href=
=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234329.345909'>Andreessen Horowitz</a>=
, <a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234330.345909'>Found=
ers Fund</a>, <a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234331.3=
45909'>Maveron</a> and several others.<br><br>The company also announced it=
s new iPad game, =E2=80=9CIF=E2=80=A6=E2=80=9D, which is now available in t=
he App Store on iTunes for free. "IF..." is a chapter-based adventure game =
that helps children learn SEL skills like how to manage difficult emotions,=
 persevere through challenges, make healthy decisions and show empathy and =
compassion. As part of the investment, Greylock partner <a id=3D"b" href=3D=
'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234332.345909'>David Sze</a> has joined I=
f You Can's Board of Directors.<table width=3D'100%' cellpadding=3D'0' cell=

e=3D"n108151"></a>Spree Commerce Scores $5M </div></div><div id=3D"v"><div =
id=3D"r"><input type=3D"hidden" value=3D"LKYPSP4C3FJEA"/><table cellpadding=
=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0"><tr><td><div id=3D"w"> SHARE: </div><td><div id=3D=
"c"><a id=3D"d" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234334.345909" tar=

ok/images/smem.gif"></a></div><td><div id=3D"c"><a id=3D"d" href=3D"https:/=

td><div id=3D"c"><a id=3D"d" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.123433=

g id=3D"e" src=3D"http://marketo.pitchbook.com/rs/pitchbook/images/smfb.png=
"></a></div></table></div></div><table cellspacing=3D"0" cellpadding=3D"0" =
width=3D"395" id=3D"u"><tr><td id=3D"s"><table cellspacing=3D"0" cellpaddin=
g=3D"0"><tr><td id=3D"i"><span id=3D"p"><table cellpadding=3D"4" cellspacin=
g=3D"4" align=3D"right" id=3D"aw"><tr><td align=3D"center"><table align=3D"=
center" cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0" width=3D"1" id=3D"at"><tr><td><=
a href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234338.345909"><img src=3D"https=
://img.pitchbook.com/news/8376.gif" align=3D"center" id=3D"ao" width=3D"180=
" /></a><tr><td align=3D"right" id=3D"ap">&nbsp; <tr><td align=3D"left" id=
=3D"aq">&nbsp; </table></table><a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com=
/n/9638.1234339.345909">Spree Commerce</a>, an open-source e-commerce platf=
orm, has raised $5 million in Series A funding led by <a id=3D"b" href=3D"h=
ttps://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234340.345909">Thrive Capital</a>. Also par=
ticipating in the round were <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n=
/9638.1234341.345909">Vegas Tech Fund</a> (led by <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https=
://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234342.345909">Tony Hsieh</a>, CEO of <a id=3D"=
b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234343.345909">Zappos.com</a>) =
and <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234344.345909">Red=
 Swan Ventures</a>, as well as existing backers <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https:/=
/my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234345.345909">True Ventures</a> and <a id=3D"b" =
href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234346.345909">AOL Ventures</a>. S=
pree's open-source software enables retailers to go to market quickly with =
fully-featured, customized storefronts.<br><br> In 2013, the company launch=
ed its hub, which automates the connections between storefronts and their b=
ackend operations, allowing customers to connect to their fulfillment provi=
ders, accounting systems, ERPs, in-store payment systems and more. The hub =
works with all major storefront platforms, including Spree, <a id=3D"b" hre=
f=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234347.345909">Magento</a> and <a id=
=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234348.345909">hybris</a>, =
among others. In less than three years, more than 45,000 retailers in over =
100 countries have chosen Spree Commerce to power their online business, in=
cluding brands like <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.123=
4349.345909">Bonobos</a> and <a id=3D"b" href=3D"https://my.pitchbook.com/n=
/9638.1234350.345909">Blue Bottle Coffee</a>.</span><tr><td id=3D"i"><table=
 cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0"><tr><td width=3D"187" valign=3D"top" i=

=3D"p"><a id=3D"b" href=3D'https://my.pitchbook.com/n/9638.1234412.345909'>=
Clayton, Dubilier & Rice</a> has reportedly raised $6.25 billion for its ni=
nth flagship fund, which is not only beyond its $5 billion target, but also=
 significantly oversubscribed (the firm is said to have turned away as much=
 as $2 billion). The fund set its hard cap at $6 billion, and the $6.25 bil=
lion total includes a $250 million commitment from the firm's partners. CD&=
R's eighth flagship fund, a $5 billion vehicle that closed in 2009, has rec=
orded a 20.11% IRR as of September 30, 2013.</span><tr><td id=3D"i"><table =
cellpadding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0"><tr><td width=3D"402" id=3D"y"><div id=

witness testimony capability. She previously worked at <a id=3D"b" href=3D"=
